message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DL 

The paper deals with representing texts as a graph and characterizing the networks using network science measurements. This falls under the scope of computational linguistics (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of word2vec and doc2vec also suggests a connection to natural language processing and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.DL). The focus on network analysis and community structure also suggests a possible connection to social network analysis (cs.SI).
